Package edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Logger
    An interface for logging events.
    UserInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchUserInterface  
    ConsoleUserInterface
    A text-based user interface that allows for execution in a headless environment.
    GameState
    A class for storing all aspects of the game state of Othello, including the board state and current player.
    GraphicalUserInterface  
    HumanOthelloPlayer
    An interface for having a human play othello through the user interface.
    Othello
    A class for playing the game Othello.
    OthelloPlayer
    This class provides the API for othello-playing agents.
    RandomOthelloPlayer
    An othello-playing agent that plays at random.
    Square
    A class for representing an individual square in the othello board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState.GameStatus
    An enumeration of the possible states of the game.
    GameState.Player
    An enumeration of the possible owners of a square in the game board.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMoveException
    Thrown to indicate that a move is not valid for the given GameState.
